paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a pathogenic BRCA2 variant identified in a hereditary breast and ovarian cancer study.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: While BRCAX was an inclusion criterion for this study, we still identified a pathogenic BRCA2 variant (p.Met192ValfsTer13) in one family.

functional_data.summary: Identified as pathogenic in the context of hereditary breast and ovarian cancer.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: Only one pathogenic variant in BRCA2 was identified in this study.
key_quotes: We still identified a pathogenic BRCA2 variant (p.Met192ValfsTer13) in one family.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data is based on the presence of a single pathogenic BRCA2 variant.
